sections.text: In addition to the penalties set forth in ยง 1-1162.21, the Ethics Board may censure a public official for a violation of the Code of Conduct that the Ethics Board finds to substantially threaten the public trust.
The Ethics Board may recommend in such censure that the Council suspend or remove a Councilmember's committee chairmanship, if any, committee membership, if any, or vote in any committee.
